text: Futhi uma umuntu ethintwa ukhala kumvelinqangi ebheka kuye ecela intethelelo, kepha uma emupha emuseni wakhe, (umuntu) uyakhohlwa ukuthi ubekhala ngokuthintwa kwakhe, bese enza abahlanganyeli kanye no Mvelinqangi edukisa abantu kude nendlela ka-Allah. Ithi, “kujabulele nkungakholwa kwakho, nina yinina eningabangane besi hogo.”
